member.name: T:PerfTimersComponent.Timers.StopWatchTimers
member.summary: The class is used to measure elapsed within the game engine for debug purposes. Internally, the component uses the system's class, but then averages the times into an array and draws to screen for user convenience. This is especially important for the XBox-360, since few (if any) commerical products exist to measure performance on this system.
